string.text: Crate in the basement
I dumped my stuff in the basement near the doors with the danger sign on them. I have no time right now, but I will definitely get it later.
Stash in the switchboard room
I made a nice little stash in the switchboard room, on the second floor of the deserted factory. I'll wait till I have a few more artefacts and then unload them all for some cash.
Stash at the dead end of the collector
I accidentally wandered into the dead end of the collector under the base. It looked like a good hiding place, so I stashed away a few goodies in the cross piece of the pipe.
Stash in the pipe
I made a stash inside a pipe on the first floor of the deserted factory, near the stairs.
Pipe under the cistern
A pack of dogs got on my trail as I was passing by the farm, so I dropped my stuff inside the pipe under the cistern and took off. I'll get it when I can.
Stash at the factory
A heck of a stash at the deserted factory. It's right across the entrance, in the cross piece with a valve. It's easy to confuse it with others that look just like it.
Backpack in the cabin
I really should go get my backpack from the front seat of the upturned tractor-trailer. I had to dump it the other day, lest I'd get my ass chased down.
Stash under the fir tree
I better not forget that particular fir tree where I dumped my loot. The collector entrance is close by, but that still don't make the tree itself stand out.
Backpack on the tree
Everybody puts their caches underground, but I made mine on a tree. I bet no one's gonna look there!
Secret stash under the roof
I'm not worried about my stash. Even if someone comes looking for it, they'll have to jump across those beams like a squirrel to get to it.
Stash at the tower
I told my partner I'd lost my backpack along the way, and the sucker ate it. Actually, I hid it on top of the water tower. It's still there waiting for me.
Backpack in the elevator
With all that shooting going on, I had little time to hide my stuff properly. I dumped it in the "hose" under the wooden boards. I'll get it when the time is right.
Locksmith's case
I found what used to be a locksmith's case and put my "treasure" inside for a while. I'll move it to a safer cache when I can.
Safe at the factory
If someone's reading this, that means I'm six feet under. So, here's what I want you to know about the stash in the safe - I hope you never open it, asshole!
I wasn't sure I'd get out of that scrape alive, so I hid my stuff in this rusty safe at the deserted farm. Now it's time to get it back.
Tree stump on the island

A buddy of mine had some real nice goodies on him when he got ambushed in those swamps. He didn't make it, but managed to tell me he hid some of the loot in a rotten tree stump not far from an antenna. I really ought to go get it.
Rotten tree log
I don't trust my partner. I think he's gonna try to mug me, so I've been hiding my loot from him. I made a stash near the island bridge, in a tree log. I hope he doesn't find it.
Rotten tree stump
I was running from boars the other day and I dumped my things into the hole of a tree stump, not far from the old farm.
Tree stump near the hill
I made my stash at the foot of the hill, under an old tree stump. It's a good hiding place - I just hope my luck continues so I can add to it.
Tree stump near the wooden deck
I've seen Kolya go near that stump on the island a number of times. I bet the tightwad's got a stash in there. I'll let him collect some more loot before I go check it out.
Old Zaporozhets car

The poor bastards are racking their brains, trying to figure out where all their stuff is disappearing! Ha-ha-ha! Well, I've been hiding it in that old little Zaporozhets car near the Swamps. I bet no one's going to look for it there.
Electrical box at the factory
I looked into Andrey's PDA and saw that when the "brain grinder" started to come down, he made a stash in a rusty electrical box at the factory.
Panel board inside the transformer room
When the whole factory started to cut out, I dumped all my stuff inside the panel in the transformer room.
Case at the factory
I was at the hangar when I found what used to be a toolkit. It was rattling, but I had no time to look inside - just left it there until next time.
A small case in the truck
A nice place for a cache - right in between the cab and the truck bed. The local zombies and radiation make for good natural protection.
Stash next to the fence
I hid a little something at the intersection of pipes near the construction car, next to the fence.
A few trinkets inside a pipe
I took the most valuable stuff with me and put the rest inside a pipe in the room with a hole in the wall.
Backpack near the entrance
I had to leave a full backpack of loot in the ruins right next to the entrance. I wonder if someone's discovered it yet...
Cache in the ventilation duct
Hey, Tony, remember the coordinates and the reference point - the backpack is inside the ventilation duct next to the broken-through wall of the compound. Regards, Owl.
Backpack under the seat
I had no time to think, so I stuck my loot under the driver's seat in the rusty UAZ vehicle.
Stash in the crane gear box
God only knows what made me go and make my stash all the way up there. Now even I can't reach it!
Cache in the safe
The best cache in the Zone belongs to me. It's a safe on the factory premises.
Hollow log
I hid my stuff in a hollow log next to the "thorn".
Log near the hill
With those zombies coming from the factory, I had no choice but to part with my loot. I hid it in a log at the foot of the hill.
Tree stump near the tower
I set up another stash in the hole of a stump, on that hill with the high-voltage tower. Everybody thinks I go there for the view, dumbasses!
Bellmouth of pipe
I made a stash in the bellmouth of a pipe, in that heap of radioactive trash.
Pipe near engine
Next to the dead engine at the junkyard, there's a pipe with my loot.
Under cross
Agroprom, bushes, cross. Tomb under cross.
Electrical panel in workshop
The son-of-a-bitch Dehydrator strips us of all our loot. Friggin' old fart. I'm hiding my stuff from his ugly ass inside the electrical panel on the second floor.
Tractor
Car in garage
I stash my junk in the trunk of the commander's 4x4. As long as it ain't going nowhere, my stuff will be safe.
Case under train car
Toolbox under train car in Agroprom.
Bus at the stop
Toolbox in a bus at the bus stop, near the neutral base.
When Timmy fixed the tractor, we got loaded and went for a wild ride at night. Then we ran into a bloodsucker. We had to hightail it real quick, and left our loot-box behind.
Pipe in rubble
Stash: blocked entrance to the underground, inside an L-shaped pipe.
Nobody's backpack
Stalker base
I tossed my backpack up on that tree crotch, or else everybody would know it was me who did Vitaly in. The shortest way to get there is via the pipes at the neutral base.
I spotted one on a tree near the Duty base, but had no time to go climbing after it.
Pipe at the Swamps
Lost backpack
We came back from a trip and were resting in the rocks, and somehow I left my backpack. I'll go back and get it when I free up some.
Rigman's backpack
I had to climb all the way to the top of that tower until our guys drove those darn dogs away. I had to drop my backpack in the bushes.
My hideaway is in a pipe at the Swamps. The loot's in the backpack.
Safe in bushes
We tried dragging that safe full of junk across the ravine. It was so muddy from the rain that we kept slipping and falling over, and eventually just dropped it along the way.
Isolated log
Easter eggs
Come Easter, Tony made us make stashes for the clan. I stuck one of these "Easter eggs" in a log.
No one's going to come looking for my stash in the log that far out in the sticks.
Pipe in control room
When monsters started flooding the area, I hid some of my things in a pipe and legged it.
Backpack in anomaly
I was crossing this bridge and accidentally let my backpack slip down into a contaminated area. I tried to get it back, but couldn't.
Backpack near dead body
Vicious little mutants, which looked kind of like rats or gerboa, tore my buddy to pieces. I barely escaped - thank God there were stairs close by.
Backpack under stairs
I saw a big black backpack in the water under the stairs. I'd go there and get it if not for that scary-ass anomaly.
Under cross on hill
I hid my loot under a fake stalker grave on the hill.
Chest above bridge
I packed my loot in a chest at the intersection of the bridge beams. Man, I sweat a metric ton climbing up there...
Pipe under felled tree
We set up camp not far from the rookie village. I hid my stuff inside a pipe under the felled tree. I'll collect it later.
Pipe in tunnel
We were trying to hit anomalies with all kinds of trash and accidentally threw in a pipe with out loot. It's still there, collecting dust.
Backpack in stovepipe
Back when I was a rookie I made a little stash up in the stovepipe. I don't even remember what's in it any more.
Stash up in tree
I was watching the vehicle station from a tree and decided to leave my backpack in it. The easiest way to climb there is via the branch from the side of the hill.
Under locomotive
My commander ordered us to help Nikolaev's group ASAP. That's when I tossed my backpack under the locomotive, next to the embankment.
Backpack behind bush
One night we ran into bandits and had ourselves a firefight. Not long into it we had to get our asses out of there, so I tossed my backpack in between some boulders, behind a bush.
Backpack under firewood
I piled some firewood up to cover my stash, which is next to a two-story building across from the farm.
Safe in pipe
Safe at base
Zil keeps his junk in a safe at the neutrals' base at the Cordon.
Kolyan and I made a hideaway in a safe at that junkyard near the rookie village.
Cache in log
I was attacked by dogs, so I didn't have much choice - I hid the loot in a cracked log in the middle of the field and ran for the camp.
Hideaway in log
I got hold of the coordinates of a dead stalker's hideaway - it's in a log behind the farm.
Tree stump in spruce forest
My buddy and I hid what little loot we had in an old stump among some fir trees.
Tree stump near village
I didn't walk too far to make my stash. I picked the first decent stump next to the rookie village with a hole in it. That's where I hide what I manage to find.
Tree stump in woods
Sidorovich asked us to make a cache next to the outpost which leads to the outside, supposedly for some rookie. I stashed everything under a tree stump near the hill.
Tree stump at the Cordon
On my way to the Garbage, I hid everything inside a stump in the woods so that bandits don't get nothing from me.
Electrical panel in trash
I put away a little something so I could sell it at the flea market later. It's in the electrical panel next to the cabin of the fallen crane.
Panel board under shed
I look forward to selling this thing I got stashed inside a panel board under a shed, not far from here.
Electrical panel at junkyard
The loot is under the electrical panel cover in a pile of trash.
Pipe at the Garbage
I put my goodies inside a cut-off pipe, so that nobody could take them from me.
Pipe at foot of crane
There's a pipe at the foot of a collapsed crane - that's where I hid some of my trinkets, you know, for a rainy day.
Backpack under fir tree
Backpack in crane cabin
I hid my backpack in the crane cabin when it was still standing up. Now I can't get in there.
Until I see better days, my backpack and all its contents will stay hidden under this fir tree.
Hideaway from my enemies
I tossed my backpack in a pile of radioactive trash so that my enemies wouldn't get it.
Stash at junkyard
I stuck my things under a concrete slab near the contaminated vehicle graveyard. I better get it back quickly, or someone beats me to it.
Roof of locomotive
I left my little backpack on top of the locomotive. It's easy to get to from the embankment, but not so easy to spot.
Safe in puddle
I doubt many people will go digging through a half-sunk safe in a puddle like that. It's a good place for a temporary stash.
Safe under support
I stuck my loot into a safe close to a radiation danger sign. A safecracker would have to be suicidal to try and get into it!
Hole inside log
I used a hole in a log not far from the concentration camp as my safe.
Log behind oak tree
Kolyan hooked me up with some info - he said Weedy stashes his loot in a hole in a log behind the dead oak tree.
Log in bushes
I stuffed my loot in a log and dragged it off into the bushes. It should stay safe and out of sight there.
Lamsters' stash

One of the diggers thought to get away with their loot, but Shepherd and his boys had other ideas. They wasted the dude, but couldn't find the loot. Only I saw the stump the diggers used as their stash.
Solitary stash
I picked a solitary hollow stump to use as a stash - just in case one of our own guys decides to rob me.
Cache near base
I don't know about anyone else, but I hide my stuff right under Yoga's nose - next to the fence, under an old stump.
Electrical panel in hospital
Our group made a stash in the electrical panel on the first floor of the hospital.
Backpack under stairs
As we were storming the second floor, we had to get rid of everything we didn't need.
Barricades in hall
I was in a pretty bad shootout, stuck in the hall on the hospital's second floor. Had to hid my loot in an old safe in the barricades.
Pipe in sewer system
I spotted someone's stash in the sewer pipe. I'll get it when we're back in that area.
Carpetbag in nook
Carpetbag in attic

We spent two days fighting off attacks. By the end of it, they made us retreat up to the roof, but that's when our reinforcements arrived. I spotted a case in the attic, but forgot to take it with me.
We were on our way past a backyard when I noticed a small toolbox behind the fence.
Pipe under UAZ car
Behind garages
I saw someone's stash behind the garages, but had no time to look through it. It's inside a large pipe behind the tree.
Pipe in container
We got pinned down in some backyard. There was a trash container and I think I saw something in it, inside a pipe. As soon as we finish our business here, I'll go back there and check it out.
A sack with some crap in it was sticking out from under a UAZ car. I had no time to check it out, but I might later - if I'm still alive.
Backpack under glove compartment
I stuck poor Tin Can's backpack under the dashboard of an old Moskvich car.
Backpack by fence
Wounded man's things
They popped one into Sanek when we were climbing over a wall. He had to drop his backpack to save his butt.
I was being chased, so I dropped my backpack near a fence at these coordinates.
Dead man's backpack
A rookie right next to me got nailed by a grenade - he croaked then and there. Dan took his backpack and tossed it under the bridge. A dead man has no use for it, but we might.
Safe in garage
We were searching the garages for a runaway and found a safe. We ought to try and crack it some time.
Half-buried log
Before we wasted that asshole, I saw him fiddling around that log behind the gazebo.
Bundle in tree stump
I saw some kind of bundle in a hole inside this stump as we were preparing for an attack.
Stash near bunker
Squint's gang was coming up on me, so I sunk a pile of loot next to some bunker hatch, in a swamp not far from the deserted vehicle station.
Small box under tower
I'm gathering all my loot in a stash I made under one of the high-voltage towers.
Box in the cabin of ZIL car
Lame Alex brought a locksmith's box from somewhere. We filled it with some goodies and stuck it into the cabin of a rusty ZIL.
Pipe at station
I hid something in the bellmouth of a pipe next to a valve, in the old pump station in the middle of a swamp.
Pipe in swamp

I got sick and tired of lugging my stuff around and across these marshes, so I dropped it off on an peninsula, in a pipe with a valve. I figured I'd lighten my load, and the stash would be safe in those reeds.
Backpack in the Swamps
I barely escaped from one of them swamp beasts. I did drop my backpack as I was running, but I don't feel like going back there for it.
Submerged safe
There's a safe submerged in the water not far from the collapsed bridge. I've put all my stuff and all my trust in that stash.
Backpack in reeds
I dumped my backpack in the reed beds as I was fighting off some boars. I ain't got a reference point, just the location coordinates.
Artefacts left behind
I swindled some sucker and took his backpack full of loot. Then I decided to stick it in the reeds for a while so I wouldn't get caught.
Tree stump near tree
I decided I would stash away my loot in a tree stump next to the dry tree. I'll take it with me when I say farewell to the Swamps.
Log near tower
A cracked log not far from a high-voltage tower.
Grave with gas mask
I trust the dead more than the living. My cache is at the graveyard, in the leftmost grave with the gas mask.
Wooden cross
I put away a little something for a rainy day. It's in the grave with the only wooden cross at the church graveyard.
Church woodpile
Dear God, please look after my things for me. I hid them in a cracked log in the woodpile.
Cache in reeds
I left my backpack in the reeds not far from the church. Now I can't find it, even with the exact coordinates in my PDA.
Safe in dirt
I stuck all my loot in a safe on a swamp shore near the church. Suck it, looters!
Carpetbag under stove

What do a hot stove and a hot chick have in common? You work them long enough and you risk getting a burning sensation! Ha-ha. So, that's the kind of stove I used for hiding my carpetbag full of loot.
Stuff in a Zaporozhets car

We spent half a night on that half-sunk Zaporozhets car before our guys came to the rescue. I didn't know who'd get to us first, so I dumped my stuff somewhere around there. I oughta get there and dig it up when the sun's still shining.
Tree stump near railroad
We were passing by the railroad when we heard some shots. I ditched my things inside a stump behind some boulders, just in case.
Pipe from cistern
My boys and I store our stuff in the pipe end, the one with the valve, which goes from the cistern to the Swamps.
Backpack near mattress
Dumbass Lekha slept on a mattress at the sunken boat, and ended up forgetting his backpack there.
Box in kitchen
I put aside some goods to trade in later, they're in a blue box in the summer kitchen.
Stash in log
Before I left for another part of the Swamps, I had to unload my backpack. I stuck some of my loot inside a cracked log.
Stash in panel board
The panel board outside the transformer room at the farmstead. Danger! Stay away!
Electrical control unit at vehicle station
When I joined Grey's gang, I put away some trinkets in the electrical control unit at the station. Who knows, it might come in useful some day.
Backpack on trail
I came across a monster on a trail, and all I had on me was a knife. I tossed the backpack and jumped at it. Some fellas found me later on, a mile away. I ought to go back there some time.
Tree stump near young tree
Let the fools be squeezed by Hook. Me, I will collect my loot little by little and stash it away under a stump near a young tree.
Safe behind dead tree
I'm saving loot to trade for my son's medication, stashing it away in a safe behind a dead tree. As soon as I have enough, I'll bolt to the outside.
Stash in bushes
I got out of the Swamps too exhausted to walk, so I dropped my stuff right on the path, in the bushes.
Stash under truck bed
In a toolbox under a truck, across from the bridge.
In the middle of swamp
I left a box of stuff in the middle of a swamp, on a piece of concrete with metal bars sticking out. I'll take it with me when I leave for the outside.
Small box inside stove
My stash is in a chest, the chest is in a stove, the stove is in a burned-down house, and the house is in the Swamps.
Safe in reeds
I don't know what a safe like that is doing here in a swamp, but I couldn't pass it up. I'll keep my stuff there for now.
Tree trunk at swamp
Our chief said not to take too much stuff with us. I hid mine under a stump next to the water tower, in the bushes under a tree.
Sawyer in swamp
I was making my way across the Swamps and noticed this rotten sawyer near a wooden deck. I thought it would make a good hideaway place for my "treasures."
Backpack on island
This swamp creature kept chasing me all over the place. After a few miles of that marathon, I got so tired that I had to drop my backpack at one of the islands.
Hatch near station
I buried my goodies under one of the hatches near the station, just so I wouldn't lose it all to some robber.
Cache in pipe
That black backpack in the big pipe is all that's left of Mitka.
Toolbox in cabin
I found a toolbox in a swamp, put all my stuff in it and hid it in a crane cabin. I'll wait until things get better before I make use of it.
Backpack under train car
I was trying to get away, so I lightened my load by dropping off my backpack under a train car on the railway bed.
On the ledge of dome
I left my backpack on the ledge of the church dome. I must have looked like a wild goat hopping around on that roof.
Under bridge
We hid under a bridge while the guys chasing us ran across it. I left my backpack with some loot down there, next to a beam.
Between boulders
I tossed my bag in a crack between three boulders, or else I would look like a target to some greedy fellas.
Sawyer under boulders
I kept searching for a safe place for my stash and found a nice sawyer with a hole in it under some boulders in the reeds.
Stash in grave
I buried my stuff under a grave cross. Let it rest in peace until I come back for it.
Cross near tree
I made a stash in the grave next to a tree.
Case in stove
I stuck a small case inside a stove in a dilapidated hut. I'll be stashing my goodies there as I collect them.
Pipe at base entrance
I hid my stuff under the ensign's very nose. It's inside the pipe behind the watchman's booth, at the entrance to the base.
Backpack near chimney
Stash in Moskvich car
When Max returns, I'll give him his backpack. Meanwhile, let it stay in that old Moskvich.
I left my backpack next to a chimney in the attic of a dilapidated house. I'd go back if it weren't for that bloodsucker in the village.
Backpack under trailer
Stash under bridge
Backpack is in a train car under the bridge in the army base.
Crack in tunnel
I dropped my backpack in the crack above the tunnel when the "heat" started, but it got caught on a metal bar. It was a shame to leave without it - I really ought to go back and get it.
Stash in toilet
I doubt anyone's gonna look for a stash in the village toilet. But that's where mine is, so I ain't worried about it.
Cache near fence
I dropped off poor Kolyan's backpack behind the hangar. I had enough of my own stuff to carry.
Backpack under tree
The second I saw that monster next to the water tower, I dropped my backpack under a fallen tree like a hot potato. Times like that running light can save your life.
Backpack in basement
I was so dizzy after the emission that I dumped my backpack in a basement. I'll come back for it after I get back on my feet.
Forgotten backpack

An explosion smashed a wall to bits and a piece of it trapped me under. I had to drop my backpack to climb outta there and kick some ass, and that was so much fun I ended up forgetting all about the backpack. Probably still down there...
Cache in kitchen
A green backpack in the kitchen stove in one of the houses of the deserted village. Coordinates recorded.
Stash under boulder
I was hauling ass the other day, and I left a backpack full of hot goods in the bushes between two boulders.
I saw this one dude throw his backpack under a trailer right before an emission hit. I ought to go check it out.
Cracked tree log
Stash in peasant's sled
Stash in huge log next to peasant's sled.
Log under boulders
At the very edge of some boulders there's a log, and inside it, away from prying eyes, is my cache.
I hid my stuff in a log under a pine tree, next to the fallen tower.
Tree stump behind concrete slabs
Stump next to fence
Vityok said he left my share of the loot in the hole of a tree stump that's between the military base's fence and the small swamp.
A stump in between two boulders, behind a pile of concrete slabs.
Blue crate
My loot's in a blue crate on the second floor of the building near the caper.
Pipe in cart
I stuck my things inside a pipe and tossed it into a rusty cart at the old quarry.
Black backpack
Backpack on tree branch
I hid from some monster up in a tree. I didn't see the beast itself, but I heard it all right. I left the backpack on the branch, jumped off and ran for my life.
Crap, I lost my black backpack when I was running out of the forest. I even know where it is, but I ain't going back there unless they napalm the whole damn place to hell.
Tree next to fence
A damn bloodsucker chased me all the way to the reserve fence and up a tree. If I hadn't left my backpack in that tree, I would never have made the jump to the fence.
Backpack in cave
I crawled inside a cave at night to get some sleep. I got a rude awakening from a bloodsucker tugging on my bag. I split from there like a track champion, but the bloodsucker's still got my backpack.
Boulder near ravine
Several dogs cornered me next to a ravine, so I tossed my backpack into some boulders and tried to break through.
Backpack in bushes
Backpack in forest
That was like being inside a horror movie. I don't know how I got out... Lost my backpack, but I remember there was only one place where I could have dropped it.
Backpack under boulders
Kolya's backpack was too much to carry, so I placed it under some boulders at the exit to the Limansk bridge.
Cursed loot
That backpack's got quite a story! All the guys who handled it are dead. I threw it away to never see the cursed thing again.
Weird place
I dozed off next to a boulder, lying on my backpack. Come morning, I found myself in an entirely different place. I tried to find that boulder, but something just kept me going in circles.
Backpack under rockslide

Some boulders broke loose from the ravine and fell right on me at the exit from the Red Forest. Then something dark started to reach out to me from behind them. I barely made it out, but had no choice but to drop my stuff along the way.
We were making our way through the bushes, and I somehow managed to lose my backpack.
Lost backpack
That idiot Abe lost my backpack in some rocks, somewhere around this spot. Now he's too afraid to go back and get it. A true friend, indeed!
Stash in mine gallery
I hid my artefacts at the very end of a deserted mine gallery.
Stump in the wilderness
I got lost in the Red Forest and dropped all my junk right here, inside a hole in a stump.
Things inside tree hole
On the way to Limansk me and Whip hid our stuff in the hole of a felled tree, near the exit from the reserve.
Hole-laden tree stump
Tree stump in front of forest
We don't know what awaits us in this forest...so we've hidden our extras in a rotten stump.
Tree stump near ravine
We put our stuff away near that helluva an anomaly. Our target is the anomaly itself. It's so amazing that it's bound to contain some real valuable artefacts.
Large tree stump
Seva told me about a large hollow stump in the Red Forest. I'll try to locate it and see what's inside.
Stash in stump
Gene and I hid a few things in a stump in the Red Forest.
Tree stump near ravine
I hit this stump as I was falling into the ravine, so I hid my loot in it for the time being.
I heard screaming and howling, so I put my things inside the nearest hole-laden tree stump and split.
Zaporozhets car at mine entrance
I stashed my loot under the seat of that Zaporozhets car next to the mine entrance. I'll pick it up again before I go see Sidorovich.
Safe at farm
Log behind garages
I hid my bit of loot in a log near the garages, next to the Yantar factory. Best place I could find at the time.
Stash under young fir tree
Not far from the swamp, I dumped my backpack by a pipe, under a young fir tree.
A small safe is hidden in the concrete pipe. It's got some stuff I saved for a rainy day.
Major Khaletskiy's stash
Old stash
Diggers used to hide their loot in this stash.
Toolbox
The old PDA is under the false bottom of the toolbox.
Stash in anomaly
If Yoga wasn't lying, a stash amidst the anomalies contains a special shooter.
Car trunk
According to Stringov, the old car trunk holds some smuggler's batch of goods.
Cache on Swamps
There's a very valuable cache at the recycling factory at the Swamps. Whatever its contents, now they're yours.
Safe with reward
Dude, these keys open a safe that holds something valuable. Or so I'm told...
Reward
Our secret stashes for your money. Selling them all down the river to you alone.
Small case
In that case, here are the coordinates of a case with some loot. You'll find it behind the trash bin, near the wall.
Safe under bridge
I won't burden you with my stories. You'll find the stash in the safe under the bridge.
Backpack as payment
The contents of this backpack, whose coordinates I'm uploading to your PDA, are more than worth the cash you're depositing into my pockets.
Code-locked safe
Your payment is well worth the loot hidden in this safe at the Swamps.
Loot as payment
The loot you'll find in the black backpack under the boulders is now yours. Let's consider this transaction settled.
Small crate at tower
A trusted source once told me about some loot in a no man's stash hidden under a tower.
Dear soldier's backpack
You'll get quite a bit more than what you paid. Your reward is inside a backpack next to a soldier's corpse.
Extra hassle
Go an extra mile, find the dead soldier's backpack - and you'll get your expenses back with interest.
Tough reward
I will reward you with information about a valuable but "tough" piece of loot. Keep on your toes though - its previous owner failed to heed my advice...
Backpack on corpse
Here's a stash tip for you: it's in the backpack on the back of a corpse.
Paratrooper
You'll find the stiff at these coordinates - his backpack holds what you're due.
Fighter's corpse
Here's the info: a young figher "resting" in the bushes is guarding his backpack for you.
Backpack under pipeline
Take these coordinates - they point to a backpack next to a stalker's corpse under the pipeline.
Tree stump near barbed wire
OK pal, to get your reward go and search a stump not far from the barbed wire
Green crate
I saved this piece of loot specially for you. It's in the army crate on the edge of the Cordon. A piece of my heart goes with it!
Small solitary backpack
And so your generosity will be rewarded with magnanimity! He-he-he. Here's a stash of mine - dispose of it and its contents as you wish.
Road to the Swamps
I take your money, you take my stash. You'll find it along the road to the Swamps, next to a corpse.
Reward for a hero
Your purchase awaits you inside the backpack next to an unlucky stalker's dead body. Look for it near the old electric locomotive.
Compensation
You'll find the cache at these coordinates, inside the backpack that's under a tree.
Access Allowed
My side of the deal is inside the elevator electrical panel. Go ahead and reach in, there's no electricity. Though I can't be sure of the same regarding an anomaly...
Case under train car
Your "catch" is the contents of a case under a train car.
Fake grave
Digging up graves is wrong. But my cache is hidden in a fake one, so you won't disturb any dead people.
Case behind junkyard

I'll pay you with the contents of the case that is lying next to an anomaly behind the junkyard at the Cordon. There's another lad nearby reaching for it, but don't mind him - he's no longer in action.
Tree stump on edge of the Garbage
Well, I'll give you a tip. Your compensation awaits you inside a stump on the edge of the Garbage.
Black backpack in wreckage
What I owe you is located inside a black backpack within the wrecked construction crane.
Cut-off pipe
I've got my money, but to get yours you'll have to haul ass over to this stash inside a cut-off pipe.
Electrical panel box in wreckage
Some time ago I made this stash for myself, but I'll have to give it up to you now. Oh well.
Small box amidst contaminated trash
I'm giving you the coordinates of a small box with loot inside. Just don't get your nuts fried - the radiation there is off the charts.
Crate near bulldozer blade
You'll find what you just bought at the base of a bulldozer blade.
Dead man's backpack
You're not afraid of ghosts, are you? Then look for a stash in the backpack next to a dead body.
Corpse near excavator
The lifeless lad near the flipped-over excavator will treat you to the contents of his backpack.
Corpse at the Garbage
Guess you'll have to sweat a little to get what I owe you. The loot's inside the backpack of this anomaly victim.
En route to Agroprom
Look for a small box inside the UAZ car en route to Agroprom. I think you'll appreciate the contents.
Safe in hangar
I hold true to my words - the promised cache awaits you in a safe at the old factory.
Corpse near rocks
You just bought the contents of a backpack that's on the corpse lying near the rocks.
Under cistern
My loot - correction, your loot now - is inside the backpack under the cistern.
Shrubs near fir tree
Coming back from a lucky trip, I hid my loot in the shrubs. Now you can make use of it.
Soldier's corpse
Write this down: very valuable loot - backpack - hapless military man - right next to an anomaly.
Loot in bushes
I always settle my tabs. And right now my tab is telling me to give you the coordinates of my loot.
Safe at Freedom's base
In the three-story building at Freedom's base there's a safe that holds something valuable for loot-seekers.
Crate on top of tower
I appreciate your interest, and will satisfy it with the contents of a blue crate on top of the tower just past Freedom's base.
Stalker's grave
You just bought what's under the cross of a stalker's grave next to an old tree.
Crate under seat
Under the driver's seat of a red LAZ you'll find a crate. Feel very free to check it out. Or not - up to you.
Tree stump near fence
For situations like this one, I've got some junk hidden safely away inside the tree stump that's near a fence.
Confiscated goods near anomaly
This soldier stumbled into an anomaly, and his backpack with the loot he seized from stalkers is still there, lying next to him. If you're lucky enough, you can make it yours.
By fence near barbed wire
OK, I'll pay you with this secret cache - a stalker's backpack that's by a fence. The HV tower will serve as your reference point.
Under uprooted tree
We don't have storage rooms in the Zone, sorry! So hurry up and lay your hands on this cache under an uprooted tree before someone else does.
Corpse in radiation hotspot
You want great stashes and great stashes is what I got. They'll be yours if you dare go in a radiation hotspot. Your prize lies by the side of a corpse.
Cylinders on grave
Honour's worth more than money, so go ahead and take the cache inside some cylinders on an unknown grave.
Corner of fence
After the last Emission, Valka Squint, God bless his soul, hid something inside this old stump at the corner of a fence.
Switchboard
My stash - uhh, sorry, your stash - is inside the switchboard in Duty's base.
Tree log near tree
The other day some nice folks told me about a stash that belongs to my enemies. Empty it out, will ya?
Corpse in van
These soldiers were speeding their bus so fast they drove right into an anomaly around this area. They all bought the farm, and you just bought their loot.
Safe under earth slide
I half-buried a safe with my loot at the bottom of a ravine. Let's pretend it was meant for you all along.
Crosspiece under stairs
There's a stash I know in this evil kind of place. On the other hand, you can be sure it's never been raided. Look for it in the basement under the stairs.
Case under ground
At the bottom of the spiral stairs you'll find a lost case with goods inside. Just be careful not to disturb the many underground residents.
Under ground
Here's a place where you can pick up a soldier's backpack. He ran into an anomaly in the Agroprom underground. Just make sure you don't do the same!
Pipe in collector
Some stalker's PDA told me about his loot hidden in the Agroprom underground. Copy the coordinates, please.
Corpse in lake
Look for the backpack of this soldier who's taking a leisurely swim in the lake.
Crate on the roof of boiler room
There's a small hideaway inside a blue crate on the roof of a boiler room. The area is teeming with zombies, so watch out.
Crate in train car
Great - now take these coordinates of a crate inside the train car at the factory. Go there and you'll know what to do.
Backpack by drain pipe
Find this backpack by the drain pipe and we'll be even. There's a dead neutral lying nearby, so you'll spot this place easily.
Case at the scientists' base
Excellent! Take everything you find inside the crate in the trunk of a UAZ in the scientists' base.
Booth with switchboard
I'll reimburse you with the coordinates of a cache in the booth near the factory.
Cistern bellmouth
Something is hidden in the cistern bellmouth at the factory. I never checked out what exactly.
MAZ truck cabin
You'll find the stuff in the cabin of this MAZ truck, packed into a case.
Tree stump across from scientists' camp
Look for the hideaway under the stump across from the scientists' camp.
Pipe in mine
I know for sure there's something valuable in this stash in the Red Forest.
Dead stalker
I saw in a dead stalker's PDA that his backpack contained something of interest. Here are those coordinates.
Dangerous stash
I already pointed some chump to this stash, but I know he never got to it - he kicked the bucket in an anomaly close by.
Red valve
The stash is hidden behind the red valve of the mine pipe system. Its contents do not interest me in the least.
Bus
A friend of mine made his stash under the backseat of this bus. He's no longer with us, so he won't mind if you raid his little hiding place.
Pipe in rubble
I learned about this hideaway from a prisoner - it's in a piece of pipe in the rubble behind the APC.
Crate with backpack
Your treasure is simply fabulous! OK, take note - the reward's in the backpack, backpack's in the crate, crate's at the bridge, bridge's on the other side of the Red Forest.
Poor guy's backpack
This poor bastard was bringing me a backpack through the Red Forest, but never made it. If you find it, it's all yours.
Safe near trolley car
My info is all true and no bullshit. Some hobo hid something valuable in a safe near the flipped-over trolley car.
Ordinary old tree stump
There's a cache in the hole-laden stump. Nothing special, just an inconspicuous place you won't find without my coordinates. That's why I'm giving them to you.
Stash in woods
A backpack is hidden under the rocks in the woods, and I'm passing its coordinates to a good man.
Backpack under dead body
It may not be a real stash, but there should be some valuable loot in that backpack on the water tower.
Cache under uprooted tree
Take it from me - there's a cache under the uprooted tree.
Grandma's safe
I don't know how a safe got on that stove, but my sources say it's not empty.
Grave stash
There's word that you can get rich if you look under the cross at these coordinates.
Crate at military base
If you manage to sneak into the military base, you'll find a reward for your troubles in a crate in an attic.
Safe in closet
My sources tell me something is kept in the safe at the military barracks.
Small safe
Captain Yeltyshev carried this safe with him all the time, until he got transferred to another location. Why don't you check it out and see what's inside?
Pile of trash
Java stuck his stuff in a pile of trash on purpose, only he later forgot about it. I made a note though, and now I'm passing it on to you.
Box with secret
Behind the cabin of the army MAZ there's a small box with a secret. That's the secret I'm selling you.
Everything is in the chest, in a train car not far from the base. That's how we planned it, now all we have to do is wait.
The agreed-upon secret stash
Put the chest into the bus - seems to be unnoticeable
Secret stash in the bus
Left some of my ammo in the electrical panel.
Stash in electrical panel
Hid my backpack under a fir tree.
Stash under the tree
There is a safe partially buried in a pile of trash. Everything's in the safe. Better not forget what was in it.
Safe in the South pile
There's a secret stash in the shadows - a good place to hide it.
Rotted stump
An anomaly got someone by the escalator - the backpack is in view, but hard to get to.
Under the dipper
Left the backpack in the radiation ruins. Was afraid to show my face there.
Dangerous secret
Hid it in the car, the Long One said it was a good place.
Secret stash in the car
Hid the backpack under the car, nobody will bother looking there
Hidden backpack
Put the chest into the car by the swamp
Car with the secret stash
Hid my crap in the car on a hill
Secret stash on a hill

Gotta take off. Sakharov and Kruglov are total psychos - they want me to go with some stalker into the centre of radiation. Screw them, as soon as I gather all the supplies in the manhole, I'm taking off.
Secret stash of the scientist
Had to leave the backpack
The left-behind backpack

The newbie ended up stealing the chest from the bandits. He put it into the Niva which turned up side down. He says that by the looks of it, it's a government chest. We'll have to arm our guys and take it.
Government chest
We left everything that we found in the chest, we'll pick it up when we're returning
Secret stash in the chest
Someone's backpack is lying around in the valley, with anomalies all around. How could you get to it?
Nobody's backpack
Threw my junk in the chest - will get it later.
Stuck the goods in a log, don't think they'll find it.
Treasure in a log
Abandoned cupboard
I always treasured that cupboard. Roomy. When mutants started pouring from their holes, we had to retreat and I left it behind.
White Zaporozhets car
Someday, Yoga's reign over the Garbage is gonna end. Then I'm gonna grab my stuff from the white car and clear out.
There's a secret stash in a stump - good place for it
Secret stash in a stump
Take the things from the rotted log
Rotted log
There's some chest in the car at the bandits' camp. We need to sneak into the car and check it out - I feel there's something in there
Chest in the car
Good chest for storing extra junk
Chest with goods
Hid the junk in the office of KAMAZ
Secret stash in KAMAZ
Hid the backpack of the newbie, and he never found it
Hidden backpack
There are robberies everywhere. They're even stealing even from their own... but they'll never find my chest
Chest
Hid my stuff in an iron capsule
Secret stash of the stalker
I threw the things into the pipe, will get them later. I had to, otherwise I would have obviously taken them along. Just hope they don't get wet.
Things in the pipe
There's a secret stash in the stump - a good place
Secret stump
Threw the backpack under a tree. Otherwise, I wouldn't have escaped the bandits.
Stalker's backpack
The chest was left in the van - needs to be picked up
Forgotten chest
Everything I stole from Borov I hid away in a safe under the pine tree. Now I have to wait it out while they finish freaking out.
Hidden safe
For now our secret stash is in the tunnel. That's a good place - few know about it, and the anomalies will keep others from getting in.
Seriy's secret stash
I hid it in the stump by the tunnel. There's a good hole there.
Stump with hole
I buried some goodies under the cross by the bush.
The mark is under the cross
They were shooting. Had to drop the backpack under the train car behind the seat. At least I got away. I'll go back and get it.
Drunkard's backpack
In the chest under the stairs there's a secret stash.
Chest in the stairwell
I hid it in the chest, nobody will check anyway.
Factory chest
I found a safe under a fallen tree. Going to hide everything there for now.
Safe under the tree
The goods are in the old pipe, we'll have to tell the guys that. I'm not climbing in there.
Radioactive pipe
There is a half buried safe under the bush - that's where I hide everything.
Safe under the bush
They discovered the chest under the support beam. Someone was dragging it along all the way from Scientific Research Institute. Let's wait for the windflier and then pick it up.
Archive box
Good chest for collecting extra junk
Chest from the institute
Hid it in the safe, but then the soldiers came and now I can't get the goods.
Agrosafe
Good chest for collecting extra junk. The institute's equipment inventory was once there.
Zavhoz chest
Good chest for small things. I kept my metalworking instruments in a chest like that at home.
Metalworking inventory
I hid the backpack by the Duty base. Will pick it up later
Hidden backpack
A large pack of dogs went after me. If I didn't leave my backpack I wouldn't have made it to the gate
The backpack that was left behind
Everything that was left they buried under the cross
Secret stash under the cross
Dropped my backpack here - it'll be easier that way
Backpack
Ammo of the Duty's security checkpoint is stored in a bunker, but nobody's keeping an eye on the chest
Supplies in the bunker
I saw how a dutyer stuck something in the pipe by the gate
Secret stash
All of this belonged to him, might as well stay here for the time being
Secret stash under the cross
I'm going to the bar, left the backpack in the hangar
Backpack
They say that there's something valuable hidden on the Duty's territory in the switchboard.
Swithboard with a secret stash
I stuck the chest in top of the tower in front of the Duty - no one will notice it
Secret stash on the tower
Hid it in the pipe under the stairs
Secret stash

Hid the goods not far from the bar, behind the anomalies - nobody will get in there. And even if they got there they wouldn't know how to open it. But it's all very simple - just pull up slightly at the door, and everything will open.
Arnie's secret stash
Buried the goods not far from the bar
Secret stash
By the bar, in a chest
Chest
Hid the chest on a side-street by the bar
Small chest
Buried it under the cross behind the pine trees
Secret stash
Hid the bit of goodies under the cross by the mountain
Secret stash under the cross
Hid the chest with the antirad in a pipe by the Arena
Small chest
Hid my crap in a pipe under the tower
Secret stash
There's a secret stash under the cross
Secret stash
When my comrades and I were fighting off the dogs in uniform, I buried some goods under the bridge. Let them stay there for now.
Under the cross
Found out from Lihoi that the secret stash is in the attic. He was talking too much so we shut him up for good.
Attic in the village
They saw that the commander has a tricky chest in his office, and there's a ton of valuable goods there.
The valuables of the commander
The goodies are hidden in the bandits' attic. They weren't there before so let's wait for the right time to take them all.
The robbers' attic
I saw how a bandit hid his goods in a chest in the hangar. How can I quietly steal it?
Bandits' storage
The head of radio communications passed along a message to us: retreat. I found a chest, threw in what I had on me, and retreated empty-handed.
Supplies in the chest
While the Dutyers were shooting, I hid the habar in the train car. Somehow I have to get in to pick it up. And to thank the Duty.
Chest at the heavily armed military checkpoint
Barely made it under the beams, but at least the backpack's well hidden - nobody will try to climb in here.
The extra cash is under the concrete blocks
Stuck my backpack into the furnace, it'll come in handy later.
Furnace secret stash
Hid the goodies in the car in the abandoned village.
Auto-secret stash
Hid away the backpack with the equipment in a cozy spot.
Backpack with equipment
A helicopter fell right by the abandoned military base, and the chest is right there, under the helicopter. One problem - there are anomalies and radiation all over the place.
Chest from the helicopter
Left the backpack in the cabin of the crane. Will pick it up later
Secret stash of the high altitude worker
Good chest for storing extra junk
Good supply chest
Threw the goods into the chest - will get them later
Temporary secret stash
Hid the goodies in the car right under the Freedom noses, didn't have any time to look for a better place
Secret stash in the car
They say that some famous stalker kicked the bucket here, and nobody's picked up his goods yet
Things of the dead stalker
They say that there's a chest in the garage with a whole ton of goodies
Treasure in the garage
They say there's a chest in the kindergarten with a whole ton of goodies in it
Old secret stash
They buried Fang in Pripyat under a monument. They left all of his goodies with him - it's not right to take away from the dead.
Fang's goodies

The last that they knew about him is that he was the sole survivor after the scorcher. He left all the supplies in some old supermarket, and moved on out. Everything went not the way it was planned, and that was the best leader of Freedom in all of our history.
Supplies of the leader of Freedom
The cross is on the way to the scorcher, didn't go any further, hid everything there under it.
Murk's treasure
Some stalker perished here, and his goodies are still lying around, nobody can get to them
Goodies of the dead stalker
They say that there's a half-buried safe in the forest and there's a bunch of goodies inside
Goodies in the safe

They told them not to fly over the Scorcher, and look what happened. They landed in the middle of the forest, and it's unlikely that anyone survived. We were supposed to get the stuff that was with them.
Package for Duty

They say that the supplies of the faction, who were trying to get to the centre of the Zone, are still under the radiation of the Scorcher. None of them returned, and the supplies remained there waiting for someone to pick them up.
Supplies of the reckless group
They say that the leader of some former faction croaked here, and there was a valuable amount of goodies with him
Goodies of the leader of former faction
Hid the backpack behind the iron plate
Hidden backpack
Stashed the goodies under the cross
Secret stash under the cross
Hid a little something in the chest under the little house. Shouldn't forget about it.
Chest under the small house
I was about to stick the backpack under the steps, when those jerks appeared. Man, how will I get it back?
Stalker's backpack
There's a half buried safe in the corner behind the tree. That's where all my junk will be for now.
Secret stash behind the tree
They hid everything in a chest in the garage that they took over during the raid.
Secret stash in the garage
Hid some things in the chest behind the booth
Hidden chest
Stuck the backpack in a hole. Seems unnoticeable from above.
Backpack in the secret stash
Hid the small chest in a safe spot
Chest in a safe spot
My backpack is up right under the roof. It's there for a rainy day.
Secret stash of the stalker
They say there's a safe in that little house, and that there's something in it
Safe in the house
Hid it in the house in a pipe. Careful, everything's out of whack there
Secret stash in the pipe
Take what we talked about from the chest. Usually nobody looks in there
Hidden chest
Hid it under the cross on a side street
Secret stash under the cross
They hid the extra supplies under the concrete at the construction site
Secret stash under the concrete
n case we need to take off quickly, we'll put the habar into the chest at the construction site.
Secret stash of the Lucky One
Hid it in one of the side streets at the construction site
Nychka
Stuck everything into some pipe - will pick it up later
Secret stash in the pipe
Hid the medicine in a chest not far from the construction site
Chest with medicine
Dragged the chest into the cabin of the crane
Chest in the crane
Hid my goods in a manhole in the corner.
Secret stash in the manhole
Went after the artefact and got into an anomaly. I was barely able to walk and dropped the backpack in the corner.
The dropped backpack
Stuck the chest right under the roof by the tower so that nobody would notice.
Small chest under the roof
We hid what we found in the pipe not far from the construction site.
Secret stash in the pipe
Dropped the backpack off by the crane
Backpack
Stuck all the goods into the log. Don't think they'll find it.
Secret stash
Threw my things into the pipe. Will pick them up later.
Secret stash in the pipe
Put the chest into the secret stash - it's a reliable place
Chest in the secret stash
Left the backpack in an abandoned building. Good, nobody's around.
The left-behind backpack
Stuck the goodies in a nondescript chest. Will get them later
Nondescript chest
Hid the goodies in the car right under the bandits' noses, didn't have any time to look for a better place
Secret stash in the car
Stashed away the goodies behind the garages
Backpack behind the garages
Hid away the backpack in a booth, right behind the iron scrap
Backpack with the loot
The goodies are hidden in the car not far from the territory. The radiation is not very high.
The loot is in the car
They say there's somebody's goodies there, but they can't get to it because of the radiation.
Old backpack
They say that here there's a secret stash of some grouping. I only wonder how they got here with the radiation?
Secret stash of a grouping

Another volunteer stalker croaked because another prototype didn't protect him from the radiation. He only made it to the middle of the territory, and stayed there. Sakharov wants to take more precise measurements, but I won't go, else I'll end up staying there myself, not far from the territory.
Backpack of the tester
They say that there is somebody's habar, but there's no way to get there because of the radiation.
Old secret stash
They say that there's somebody's safe here, but there's no way to get to it because of the radiation.
Chest with goods
